member.name: F:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.Razor.Constants.ExternalAccessServerName
member.summary: The name we use for the "server" in cohosting, which is not really an LSP server, but we use it for telemetry to distinguish events

Maps a range in the specified generated document uri to a range in the Razor document that owns the generated document. If the uri passed in is not for a generated document, or the range cannot be mapped for some other reason, the original passed in range is returned unchanged.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.Razor.RemoteWorkspaceProvider.GetWorkspace
member.summary: Gets the remote workspace used in the Roslyn OOP process
member.remarks:
Normally getting a workspace is possible from a document, project or solution snapshot but in the Roslyn OOP process that is explicitly denied via an exception. This method serves as a workaround when a workspace is needed (eg, the Go To Definition API requires one).
This should be used sparingly and carefully, and no updates should be made to the workspace.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.Razor.RemoteWorkspaceProvider.TestAccessor
member.summary: This is crap, but our EA can not have IVT to Roslyn's servicehub project, because it would cause a circular reference. This project does have IVT though, so we have to put this code here. Needless to say, this should only be called by tests.
